item.description:
JAZZâ€™S NEW HOME
Fri Jan 30, 8-10:30pm, The Studio @ Billings Forge, 565-565 Broad St, Hartford. Fierce Jazz in the hottest new, live music venue in town. Get down to The Studio @ Billings Forge where Bronx-based saxophonist Albert Rivera and his quintet featuring Jean Caze, John Iannuzzi and local musicians Zaccai and Luques Curtis take the stage. Meet other jazz aficionados and newbie jazz lovers alike and take in the unique atmosphere of this newly minted multi-purpose community space for performing and visual arts. $10; $7 w/Let*s GO Arts! 548-9877, billingsforgeworks.org

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: JAZZ'S NEW HOME
